message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000, which is the minimum I'm willing to go, but I'm open to negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit closer to my minimum. How about we settle on $1100000? It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and it's a compromise on my end.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit too far from my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but I think that's the maximum I can stretch. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum. How about we settle on $1050000? It's still a good deal for you, and it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $975000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at this price?

I understand you're trying to make a deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $975000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum. How about we settle on $1075000? It's still a good deal for you, and it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to go up to $990000, but I think that's as high as I can stretch. Can we meet at this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet at a price that works for both of us, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum. How about we settle on $1090000? It's still a good deal for you, and it's a fair price considering the product's value to you. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're making a last concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $995000, but that's my absolute maximum. I'm starting to think that buying from John might be a better option.
